pkgmetadata.longdescription: Metabolic Pathway Completeness and Abundance Calculation // Provides tools for analyzing metabolic pathway completeness, abundance, and transcripts using KEGG Orthology (KO) data from (meta)genomic and (meta)transcriptomic studies. Supports both completeness (presence/absence) and abundance-weighted analyses. Includes built-in KEGG reference datasets. For more details see Li et al. (2023) doi:10.1038/s41467-023-42193-7.
